title: AR-Based Topographic Map Learning: Multisensory Experiential Education for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic geography terminology and map-reading skills
context.additional_context: An educational course focused on improving spatial thinking skills using augmented reality technology for adult learners working in medical/legal/technical professions

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain the correspondence between 3D terrain and 2D topographic maps using an AR sandbox with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can interpret terrain characteristics by analyzing slope, elevation, and contour line patterns implemented in augmented reality with 75% accuracy.
Learners can demonstrate collaborative learning skills by integrating their work into a digital project that recreates real-world terrain via AR.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
